text: Andrej Urlep (born July 19, 1957) is a Slovenian professional basketball coach, and former head coach for Stelmet Zielona Góra in the Polish Basketball League. For the 2019-2020 season, the Mono Vampire Basketball Club of Thailand announced that Urlep would be their head coach for the season. Urlep is a five-time Polish Basketball League Champion as a coach, and a two-times vice- champion. He also coached Slovenia's U22 team during the early stage of his career. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Expatriate basketball people in Thailand Category:Slovenian basketball coaches Category:Slovenian expatriate basketball people in Lithuania Category:Slovenian expatriate basketball people in Poland Category:Sportspeople from Ljubljana
title: Andrej Urlep
